definition: a jet engine containing its own propellant and driven by reaction propulsion, to propel with a rocket
details:
noun
- a jet engine containing its own propellant and driven by reaction propulsion
= synonyms: rocket engine
- any vehicle self-propelled by a rocket engine
= example: any vehicle self-propelled by a rocket engine
= synonyms: projectile
- sends a firework display high into the sky
= synonyms: skyrocket
- propels bright light high in the sky, or used to propel a lifesaving line or harpoon
= synonyms: skyrocket
- erect European annual often grown as a salad crop to be harvested when young and tender, known as arugula in some dialects of English
= example: erect European annual often grown as a salad crop to be harvested when young and tender, known as arugula in some dialects of English
= synonyms: roquette, garden rocket, rocket salad, arugula
verb
- to propel with a rocket
= example: to propel with a rocket
- to gain speed abruptly
= example: to gain speed abruptly
= synonyms: skyrocket
